Description: Fragment of oval handle from a possibly Koan pottery transport amphora. Stamp deeply impressed. Clay medium, light brown. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p.133, 13. Name, Sopatros.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0185)
